recommendation:
• Use current versions of Polymer, Polymer UI, Polymer UI Elements and <x-html> installed via Bower.
  • Use current version of Chrome Dev channel (Web Platform features enabled) or Chrome Canary (Web Platform features disabled)

recommendation:
• Polymer is going through reorganisation due to new version 0.1.0. For the time being, use versions of Polymer (x-html/examples/polymer.min.js), Polymer UI, Polymer UI Elements and <x-html> available in <x-html> repo.
  • Use current version of Chrome Dev channel (Web Platform features enabled)
